description: A passionate lion dancer from Liyue, Gaming is a Pyro claymore user who excels at fast-paced attacks and Pyro DPS.

artifacts.name: Shimenawa's Reminiscence (2) + Crimson Witch of Flames (2)

info: Gaming is a Pyro DPS who excels at fast-paced attacks and Pyro application. Build him for CRIT, ATK%, and Pyro DMG Bonus.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Stellar Rend
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes with a claymore.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes with a claymore.
Charged Attack
Drains stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Bestial Ascent
skills.desc: Gaming dashes forward, dealing Pyro DMG and entering the Lion Dancer state, increasing his resistance to interruption and enabling special attacks.
skills.details_html:
Bestial Ascent
Dashes forward, dealing Pyro DMG and entering the Lion Dancer state, increasing resistance to interruption and enabling special attacks. Consecutive attacks increase Lion Dancer stacks, enhancing damage.

skills.name: Suanni's Spirit Soars
skills.desc: Gaming unleashes a powerful attack, dealing AoE Pyro DMG and ending the Lion Dancer state.
skills.details_html:
Suanni's Spirit Soars
Unleashes a powerful attack, dealing AoE Pyro DMG and ending the Lion Dancer state. Damage scales with the number of Lion Dancer stacks consumed.

passive_talents.name: Lion's Agility
passive_talents.desc: Increases movement speed for all party members by 10% during Lion Dancer state.

passive_talents.name: Pyro Mastery
passive_talents.desc: When Gaming triggers an Overloaded reaction, his ATK is increased by 20% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Festival Performer
passive_talents.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, the time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Blazing Steps
constellations.desc: When Gaming triggers an Overloaded reaction, his CRIT Rate is increased by 15% for 10s.

constellations.name: Lion's Pride
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Bestial Ascent by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dancer's Spirit
constellations.desc: Suanni's Spirit Soars deals 30% more DMG to enemies affected by Pyro.

constellations.name: Festival's Peak
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Suanni's Spirit Soars by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Unstoppable Lion
constellations.desc: When Gaming's HP falls below 50%, his Pyro DMG Bonus is increased by 20%.
